trans-unit.source: Represents an open connection to a database.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个到数据库的打开的连接。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 此类型已弃用，将.NET Framework 的未来版本中删除。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Oracle 和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> object represents a unique connection to an Oracle database.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>对象表示的唯一连接到 Oracle 数据库。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a client/server database system, it is equivalent to a network connection to the server.
trans-unit.target: 对于客户端/服务器数据库系统，它相当于网络连接到服务器。

trans-unit.source: An application that creates an instance of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> object can set declarative or imperative security demands that require all direct and indirect callers to have adequate permission to the code.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例的应用程序<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>对象可以设置声明性或命令性安全要求，要求所有直接和间接调用方拥有足够权限的代码。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> creates security demands by using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermission> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> 通过使用创建的安全要求<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermission>对象。

trans-unit.source: Users can verify that their code has adequate permissions by using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute> object.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以验证他们的代码通过使用具有足够的权限<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OraclePermissionAttribute>对象。

trans-unit.source: Users and administrators can also use the Code Access Security Policy Tool (Caspol.exe) to modify security policy at the machine, user, and enterprise levels.
trans-unit.target: 用户和管理员还可以使用代码访问安全策略工具 (Caspol.exe) 来修改在计算机、 用户和企业级别的安全策略。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a9621d7-8883-4a4f-a874-65e8e09e20a6).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[安全性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a9621d7-8883-4a4f-a874-65e8e09e20a6)。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the **Connection** object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> does not support a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 与不同**连接**中的其他.NET Framework 数据提供程序 （SQL Server、 OLE DB 和 ODBC），对象<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>不支持<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting a connection time-out either as a property or in the connection string has no effect, and the value returned is always zero.
trans-unit.target: 将连接超时设置作为属性或连接字符串中不起作用，而返回的值始终为零。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> also does not support a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Database%2A> property or a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> 也不支持<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Database%2A>属性或<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> object goes out of scope, it remains open.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>对象超出范围时，它保持打开状态。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should always close <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> objects by calling <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A> or **Dispose**, or by using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> object within a `Using` statement.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你始终应关闭<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>对象通过调用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A>或**释放**，或通过使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>对象内`Using`语句。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the garbage collection might not free them immediately.
trans-unit.target: 否则，在垃圾回收可能不会立即释放它们。

trans-unit.source: Such delays can cause errors if the maximum number of connections is reached while a number of connections are waiting to be deleted by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 如果在连接的数目等待垃圾回收器删除达到最大连接数，这种延迟可能导致错误。

trans-unit.source: By contrast, closing the connections by calling <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A> uses native resources more efficiently, enhancing scalability and improving overall application performance.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，通过调用关闭连接<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A>更有效地使用本机资源增强可伸缩性并提高应用程序的总体性能。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that connections are always closed, open the connection inside of a `Using` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保始终关闭连接，打开的内部连接`Using`块。

trans-unit.source: To deploy high-performance applications, you often need to use connection pooling.
trans-unit.target: 若要将高性能应用程序的部署，通常需要使用连接池。

trans-unit.source: However, when you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle, you do not need to enable connection pooling because the provider manages this automatically.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在将用于 Oracle.NET Framework 数据提供程序，你不必启用连接池，因为提供程序会自动管理。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> and an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>和<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> is opened and set as the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>打开并将其设置为<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.Connection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>, and closes the connection.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后调用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>，关闭连接。

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A> is passed a connection string and a query string that is an SQL INSERT statement.
trans-unit.target: 若要实现此目的，<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>传递连接字符串和一个 SQL INSERT 语句的查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates and opens an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建并打开<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>。

trans-unit.source: The connection used to open the database.
trans-unit.target: 用于打开数据库的连接。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> class with the specified connection string.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的连接字符串初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates and opens an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建并打开<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>。

trans-unit.source: Begins a transaction at the database.
trans-unit.target: 在数据库中开始一个事务。

trans-unit.source: Begins a transaction at the database.
trans-unit.target: 在数据库中开始一个事务。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 表示新事务的对象。

trans-unit.source: To commit or roll back the transaction, you must explicitly use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要提交或回滚事务，必须显式使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Commit%2A>或<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as those provided by the database.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 事务管理模型正常运行，请避免使用其他事务管理模型，如提供的数据库。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify an isolation level, the default isolation level is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定隔离级别，使用的默认隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: To specify an isolation level with the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> method, use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> overload.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定隔离级别与<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>方法，请使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>重载。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> and an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>和<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction>。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>， <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Commit%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持并行事务。

trans-unit.source: The transaction isolation level for this connection.
trans-unit.target: 该连接的事务隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: Begins a transaction at the database with the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> 值在数据库中开始一个事务。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 表示新事务的对象。

trans-unit.source: To commit or roll back the transaction, you must explicitly use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要提交或回滚事务，必须显式使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Commit%2A>或<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as those provided by the database.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 事务管理模型正常运行，请避免使用其他事务管理模型，如提供的数据库。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> and an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>和<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction>。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>， <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Commit%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持并行事务。

trans-unit.source: The name of the database to use instead of the current database.
trans-unit.target: 要代替当前数据库加以使用的数据库的名称。

trans-unit.source: Changes the current database for an open <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 更改已打开的 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> 的当前数据库。

trans-unit.source: The `value` parameter must contain a valid database name, and cannot contain a null value, an empty string (""), or a string with only blank characters.
trans-unit.target: `value`参数必须包含有效的数据库名称，并且不能包含 null 值、 空字符串 ("")，或只有空白字符的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the **Connection** object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> does not support a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 与不同**连接**中的其他.NET Framework 数据提供程序 （SQL Server、 OLE DB 和 ODBC），对象<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>不支持<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting a connection time-out either as a property or in the connection string has no effect, and the value returned is always zero.
trans-unit.target: 将连接超时设置作为属性或连接字符串中不起作用，而返回的值始终为零。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> also does not support a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Database%2A> property or a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> 也不支持<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Database%2A>属性或<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The database name is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 数据库名称无效。

trans-unit.source: The connection is not open.
trans-unit.target: 连接未打开。

trans-unit.source: Cannot change the database.
trans-unit.target: 不能更改数据库。

trans-unit.source: Empties the connection pool.
trans-unit.target: 清空连接池。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ClearAllPools%2A> resets (or empties) the connection pool.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ClearAllPools%2A> 重置 （或清空） 的连接池。

trans-unit.source: If connections are in use at the time of the call, they are marked appropriately and are discarded when <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A> is called on them.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接中正在使用的调用时，它们进行相应的标记，并且被丢弃时<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A>对其调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> to be cleared from the pool.
trans-unit.target: 要从池中清除的 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: Empties the connection pool associated with the specified connection.
trans-unit.target: 清空与指定连接关联的连接池。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ClearPool%2A> method clears the connection pool that is associated with `connection`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ClearPool%2A> 方法清除与关联的连接池`connection`。

trans-unit.source: If additional connections associated with `connection` are in use at the time of the call, they are marked appropriately and are discarded when <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A> is called on them.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他连接与关联`connection`是在调用时使用，它们进行相应的标记，是被丢弃时<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A>对其调用。

trans-unit.source: Closes the connection to the database.
trans-unit.target: 关闭与数据库之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A> method rolls back any pending transactions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A>方法回滚任何挂起的事务。

trans-unit.source: It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将释放到连接池，连接或关闭的连接，如果禁用连接池。

trans-unit.source: An application can call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A> more than once without generating an exception.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以调用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A>多次而不会生成异常。

trans-unit.source: When you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle, you do not need to enable connection pooling because the provider manages this automatically.
trans-unit.target: 在将用于 Oracle.NET Framework 数据提供程序，你不需要启用连接池，因为提供程序会自动管理。

trans-unit.source: Do not call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A> on a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>, a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class.
trans-unit.target: 不要调用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A>上<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>、 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>，或在任何其他托管的对象`Finalize`你类的方法。

trans-unit.source: In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly.
trans-unit.target: 在终结器中，你应仅释放类直接拥有的非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition.
trans-unit.target: 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Garbage Collection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string used to open an Oracle database.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于打开 Oracle 数据库的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The Oracle connection string that includes settings, such as the server name, needed to establish the initial connection.
trans-unit.target: 包含设置（如服务器名称等）的 Oracle 连接字符串需要建立初始连接。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A> can be set only when the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A>关闭连接时，才可以设置。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property to connect to a database.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A>属性，以连接到数据库。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates a typical connection string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示一个典型的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: Many of the settings specified in the string have corresponding read-only properties (for example, `Data Source=MyServer`, which corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.DataSource%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: 许多字符串中指定的设置具有相应的只读属性 (例如， `Data Source=MyServer`，它对应于<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.DataSource%2A>属性)。

trans-unit.source: When the connection string is set, all of these properties are updated, unless an error is detected, in which case none of the properties are updated.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串设置时，所有这些属性被更新，除非错误检测到，在这种情况下会更新任何属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> properties return only default settings or those settings specified in the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> 属性只返回默认设置或中指定这些设置<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Resetting the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A> on a closed connection resets all connection string values (and related properties), including the password.
trans-unit.target: 重置<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A>关闭的连接将重置所有连接字符串值 （和相关的属性），包括密码。

trans-unit.source: The connection string is parsed immediately after being set.
trans-unit.target: 在设置之后立即分析连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: If parsing reveals errors in syntax, a run-time exception, such as <xref:System.ArgumentException>, is generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果如分析时发现错误在语法中，运行时异常， <xref:System.ArgumentException>，生成。

trans-unit.source: Other errors can be found only when an attempt is made to open the connection.
trans-unit.target: 仅当尝试打开连接时，可以找到其他错误。

trans-unit.source: The basic format of a connection string is a series of keyword/value pairs separated by semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串的基本格式是用分号分隔的关键字/值对一系列。

trans-unit.source: The equal sign (=) connects each keyword and its value.
trans-unit.target: 每个关键字和它的值之间用等号 (=) 连接。

trans-unit.source: To include values that contain a semicolon, single-quote character, or double-quote character, the value must be enclosed in double quotes.
trans-unit.target: 若要包含的值包含分号、 单引号字符或双引号字符，则该值必须括在双引号内。

trans-unit.source: If the value contains both a semicolon and a double-quote character, the value can be enclosed in single quotes.
trans-unit.target: 如果值包含分号和双引号字符，则该值可以被括在单引号中。

trans-unit.source: The single quote is also useful if the value begins with a double-quote character.
trans-unit.target: 单引号也是有用如果双引号字符开头的值。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, the double quote can be used if the value begins with a single quote.
trans-unit.target: 相反，如果值开头为单引号，则可以使用双引号。

trans-unit.source: If the value contains both single-quote and double-quote characters, the quote character used to enclose the value must be doubled each time it occurs within the value.
trans-unit.target: 如果值包含单引号和双引号字符，用于将值括起来的引号字符必须成对出现每次它出现时的值中。

trans-unit.source: To include preceding or trailing spaces in the string value, the value must be enclosed in either single quotes or double quotes.
trans-unit.target: 若要包含前导或尾随空格的字符串值，则该值必须括在单引号或双引号中。

trans-unit.source: Any leading or trailing spaces around integer, Boolean, or enumerated values are ignored, even if enclosed in quotes.
trans-unit.target: 忽略任何前导空格或尾随空格围绕整数、 布尔值或枚举的值，即使用引号括起来。

trans-unit.source: However, spaces within a string literal keyword or value are preserved.
trans-unit.target: 但是，将保留在字符串文字关键字或值中的空间。

trans-unit.source: Single or double quotes may be used within a connection string without using delimiters unless a quote character is the first or last character in the value, for example, `Data Source= my'Server` or `Data Source= my"Server`.
trans-unit.target: 不使用分隔符，除非引号字符不是在值的第一个或最后一个字符等情况下，可能的连接字符串中使用单引号或双引号`Data Source= my'Server`或`Data Source= my"Server`。

trans-unit.source: To include an equal sign (=) in a keyword or value, it must be preceded by another equal sign.
trans-unit.target: 若要包含等号 （=） 中的关键字或值，它前面必须是另一个等号。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the hypothetical connection string
trans-unit.target: 例如，在假设的连接字符串

trans-unit.source: the keyword is "key=word" and the value is "value".
trans-unit.target: 关键字是"键 = word"，值为"value"。

trans-unit.source: If a specific keyword in a keyword/value pair occurs more than once in a connection string, the last occurrence is used in the value set.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接字符串中的关键字/值对中的特定关键字出现多次，最后一个匹配项用于设置的值。

trans-unit.source: Keywords are case insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 关键字是区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid names for values within the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了中的值的有效名称<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: name

trans-unit.source: Default
trans-unit.target: 默认

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Data Source
trans-unit.target: “数据源”

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Server
trans-unit.target: 服务器

trans-unit.source: The name or network address of the instance of Oracle to which to connect.
trans-unit.target: 要连接到的 Oracle 实例的名称或网络地址。

trans-unit.source: Integrated Security
trans-unit.target: Integrated Security

trans-unit.source: 'false'
trans-unit.target: 'false'

trans-unit.source: Whether the connection is to be a secure connection or not.
trans-unit.target: 连接是否是安全的连接，或不。

trans-unit.source: Recognized values are `true` (strongly recommended), `false`, `yes`, and `no`.
trans-unit.target: 可识别的值为`true`（强烈建议）， `false`， `yes`，和`no`。

trans-unit.source: Password
trans-unit.target: Password

trans-unit.source: The password for the Oracle account logging on.
trans-unit.target: 日志记录 Oracle 帐户的密码。

trans-unit.source: To maintain a high level of security, we strongly recommend that you use the Integrated Security keyword instead.
trans-unit.target: 为了保持高级别的安全性，我们强烈建议你改为使用集成安全性关键字。

trans-unit.source: Persist Security Info
trans-unit.target: Persist Security Info

trans-unit.source: 'false'
trans-unit.target: 'false'

trans-unit.source: When set to `false` or `no` (strongly recommended), security-sensitive information such as the password is not returned as part of the connection if the connection is open or has ever been in an open <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.State%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为`false`或`no`（强烈建议），如果连接是打开的或者一直处于打开不作为连接的一部分返回安全敏感信息，如密码<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.State%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Resetting the connection string resets all connection string values, including the password.
trans-unit.target: 重置连接字符串将所有的连接字符串值，包括密码重置。

trans-unit.source: Recognized values are `true`, `false`, `yes`, and `no`.
trans-unit.target: 已识别的值为 `true`、`false`、`yes` 和 `no`。

trans-unit.source: Unicode
trans-unit.target: Unicode

trans-unit.source: 'false'
trans-unit.target: 'false'

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle uses UTF16 mode API calls.
trans-unit.target: 指定适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序是否使用 UTF16 模式 API 调用。

trans-unit.source: This keyword is ignored except when using Oracle9i client software.
trans-unit.target: 此关键字将被忽略，除非使用 Oracle9i 客户端软件。

trans-unit.source: User ID
trans-unit.target: User ID

trans-unit.source: The Oracle login account.
trans-unit.target: Oracle 登录帐户。

trans-unit.source: To maintain a high level of security, we strongly recommend that you use the Integrated Security keyword instead.
trans-unit.target: 为了保持高级别的安全性，我们强烈建议你改为使用集成安全性关键字。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid names for connection pooling values within the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的连接池内的值的有效名称<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Name
trans-unit.target: name

trans-unit.source: Default
trans-unit.target: 默认

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Connection Lifetime
trans-unit.target: 连接生存期

trans-unit.source: When a connection is returned to the pool, its creation time is compared with the current time, and the connection is destroyed if that time span (in seconds) exceeds the value specified by `Connection Lifetime`.
trans-unit.target: 连接返回到池中后，创建时间将与当前时间进行比较，如果时间跨度（秒）超过 `Connection Lifetime` 指定的值，该连接将被破坏。

trans-unit.source: This is useful in clustered configurations to force load balancing between a running server and a server just brought online.
trans-unit.target: 在聚集配置中可以使用它来强制在运行服务器和刚联机的服务器之间达到负载平衡。

trans-unit.source: A value of zero causes pooled connections to have the maximum connection time-out.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0 会导致池的连接具有最大连接超时。

trans-unit.source: Enlist
trans-unit.target: Enlist

trans-unit.source: 'true'
trans-unit.target: 'true'

trans-unit.source: When `true` or `yes`, the pooler automatically enlists the connection in the creation thread's current transaction context.
trans-unit.target: 当`true`或`yes`，池进程中自动登记创建线程的当前事务上下文中的连接。

trans-unit.source: Recognized values are `true`, `false`, `yes`, and `no`.
trans-unit.target: 已识别的值为 `true`、`false`、`yes` 和 `no`。

trans-unit.source: Max Pool Size
trans-unit.target: Max Pool Size

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of connections allowed in the pool.
trans-unit.target: 池中允许的最大连接数。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `Max Pool Size` value of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A> can affect performance.
trans-unit.target: 设置`Max Pool Size`值<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A>可能会影响性能。

trans-unit.source: If you plan to create and actively use more than 100 connections, you should increase `Max Pool Size` to a value that approximates the steady-state connection usage for the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果你计划创建和主动使用超过 100 个连接，则应增加`Max Pool Size`总数接近于应用程序的稳定状态连接使用情况的值。

trans-unit.source: Min Pool Size
trans-unit.target: Min Pool Size

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of connections allowed in the pool.
trans-unit.target: 最小池中所允许的连接数。

trans-unit.source: Pooling
trans-unit.target: Pooling

trans-unit.source: 'true'
trans-unit.target: 'true'

trans-unit.source: When `true` or `yes`, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> object is drawn from the appropriate pool, or if necessary, is created and added to the appropriate pool.
trans-unit.target: 当`true`或`yes`、<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>对象绘制从相应的池中，或如有必要，被创建并添加到相应的池中。

trans-unit.source: Recognized values are `true`, `false`, `yes`, and `no`.
trans-unit.target: 已识别的值为 `true`、`false`、`yes` 和 `no`。

trans-unit.source: When setting keyword or connection pooling values that require a Boolean value, you can use 'yes' instead of 'true', and 'no' instead of 'false'.
trans-unit.target: 在设置关键字或连接池需要一个布尔值的值时，你可以使用是而不是 'true'，和否而不是 'false'。

trans-unit.source: Integer values are represented as strings.
trans-unit.target: 整数值表示为字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> and sets some of its properties in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>并设置其属性的一些连接字符串中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time to wait to establish a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.
trans-unit.target: 获取在建立连接时终止尝试并生成错误之前所等待的时间。

trans-unit.source: The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open.
trans-unit.target: 等待连接打开所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 15 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 15 秒。

trans-unit.source: You can set the amount of time a connection waits to time out by using the `Connect Timeout` or `Connection Timeout` keywords in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用连接等待的时间量设置为超时`Connect Timeout`或`Connection Timeout`连接字符串中的关键字。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates no limit, and should be avoided in a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A> because an attempt to connect waits indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0 表示没有限制，，应当避免在<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString%2A>由于尝试连接将无限期等待。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the `Connection` object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> does not support a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 与不同`Connection`中的其他.NET Framework 数据提供程序 （SQL Server、 OLE DB 和 ODBC），对象<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>不支持<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting a connection time-out either with a property or in the connection string has no effect, and the value returned is always zero.
trans-unit.target: 设置使用属性或连接字符串中的连接超时不起作用，而返回的值始终为零。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> also does not support a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Database%2A> property or a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> 也不支持<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Database%2A>属性或<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值小于 0。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> object associated with the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个与该 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current database or the database to be used after a connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前数据库的名称或打开连接后要使用的数据库的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the current database or the name of the database to be used after a connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 当前数据库的名称或打开连接后要使用的数据库的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Database%2A> property updates dynamically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Database%2A>属性会动态更新。

trans-unit.source: If you change the current database using a SQL statement or the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A> method, an informational message is sent and the property is updated automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更改当前数据库使用 SQL 语句或<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A>方法，发送一条信息性消息，并自动更新的属性。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the `Connection` object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> does not support a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 与不同`Connection`中的其他.NET Framework 数据提供程序 （SQL Server、 OLE DB 和 ODBC），对象<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>不支持<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting a connection time-out either with a property or in the connection string has no effect, and the value returned is always zero.
trans-unit.target: 设置使用属性或连接字符串中的连接超时不起作用，而返回的值始终为零。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> also does not support a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Database%2A> property or a <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> 也不支持<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Database%2A>属性或<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the Oracle server to which to connect.
trans-unit.target: 获取要连接的 Oracle 服务器的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the Oracle server to which to connect.
trans-unit.target: 要连接的 Oracle 服务器的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> and displays some of its read-only properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>并显示部分只读属性。

trans-unit.source: A reference to an existing <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction" /> in which to enlist.
trans-unit.target: 对用于登记的现有 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的事务中登记为分布式事务。

trans-unit.source: New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.EnlistTransaction%2A> method to enlist in a distributed transaction.
trans-unit.target: 新增 ADO.NET 2.0 中功能支持使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.EnlistTransaction%2A>方法在分布式事务中登记。

trans-unit.source: Because it enlists a connection in a <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the <xref:System.Transactions> namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction** for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: 因为它登记中的连接<xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>实例， **EnlistTransaction**中可用的功能利用<xref:System.Transactions>命名空间用于管理分布式事务，使其优于**EnlistDistributedTransaction**为此目的。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[分布式事务](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can continue to enlist in an existing distributed transaction using the
trans-unit.target: 你可以继续在现有使用分布式的事务中登记

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.EnlistDistributedTransaction%2A> method if auto-enlistment is disabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.EnlistDistributedTransaction%2A> 如果禁用了自动登记的方法。

trans-unit.source: Enlisting in an existing distributed transaction ensures that, if the transaction is committed or rolled back, modifications made by the code at the data source are also committed or rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 在现有分布式事务中登记可以确保，如果事务是提交还是回滚，数据源的代码所做的修改是也提交或回滚。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.EnlistDistributedTransaction%2A> returns an exception if the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> has already started a transaction using <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.EnlistDistributedTransaction%2A> 如果返回异常<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>已经启动了事务使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>。

trans-unit.source: However, if the transaction is a local transaction started at the data source (for example, by explicitly executing the BEGIN TRANSACTION statement using an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand> object), <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.EnlistDistributedTransaction%2A> rolls back the local transaction and enlists in the existing distributed transaction as requested.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果事务是在数据源上开始的本地事务 (例如，通过显式执行 BEGIN TRANSACTION 语句使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand>对象)，<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.EnlistDistributedTransaction%2A>回滚该本地事务并在现有中登记为请求的分布式的事务。

trans-unit.source: You will not receive notice that the local transaction was rolled back, and are responsible for managing any local transactions not started using <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不会收到通知，该本地事务已回滚，并且会负责管理任何本地事务没有启动使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>。

trans-unit.source: A reference to an existing <see cref="T:System.Transactions.Transaction" /> in which to enlist.
trans-unit.target: 对用于登记的现有 <see cref="T:System.Transactions.Transaction" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的事务中登记为分布式事务。

trans-unit.source: New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the
trans-unit.target: 新增 ADO.NET 2.0 中功能支持使用

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.EnlistTransaction%2A> method to enlist in a distributed transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnection.EnlistTransaction%2A> 方法在分布式事务中登记。

trans-unit.source: Because it enlists a connection in a <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the <xref:System.Transactions> namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction**, which uses a **System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction** object.
trans-unit.target: 因为它登记中的连接<xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>实例， **EnlistTransaction**中可用的功能利用<xref:System.Transactions>命名空间用于管理分布式事务，使其优于**EnlistDistributedTransaction**，它使用**System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction**对象。

trans-unit.source: It also has slightly different semantics: once a connection is explicitly enlisted on a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes.
trans-unit.target: 它还具有略有不同的语义： 后在事务中显式登记连接，不能取消登记或第一个事务完成之前在另一个事务中登记。

trans-unit.source: For more information about distributed transactions, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关分布式事务的详细信息，请参阅[分布式事务](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns schema information for the data source of this <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回此 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> 的数据源的架构信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns schema information for the data source of this <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回此 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> 的数据源的架构信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> that contains schema information.
trans-unit.target: 包含架构信息的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the schema to return.
trans-unit.target: 指定要返回的架构的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns schema information for the data source of this <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> using the specified string for the schema name.
trans-unit.target: 使用表示架构名称的指定字符串返回此 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> 的数据源的架构信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> that contains schema information.
trans-unit.target: 包含架构信息的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />。

trans-unit.source: Queries using <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.GetSchema%2A> are case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 查询使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.GetSchema%2A>区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Because of Oracle's treatment of cases when a schema is first created, this can lead to unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 由于 Oracle 的处理的事例时首次创建架构，这可能导致意外的结果。

trans-unit.source: If the schema was created without quotes`,` Oracle stores the object name in upper case.
trans-unit.target: 如果架构创建不带引号`,`Oracle 以大写形式存储的对象名称。

trans-unit.source: If the schema was created with quotes, Oracle stores the object name in the casing provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建包含引号的架构，Oracle 提供的大小写方面存储的对象名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that you create a table called MyTable, using one of the following two statements:
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你创建一个名为 MyTable，使用以下两个语句之一表：

trans-unit.source: To retrieve information about this table via the **GetSchema** method in the first case, you would have to pass "MYTABLE" in as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索有关通过此表的信息**GetSchema**方法中第一种情况，你将必须作为自变量中传递"MYTABLE"。

trans-unit.source: In the second case, you would have to pass "MyTable" in as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 在第二种情况，你必须在作为参数传递"MyTable"。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="collectionName" /> is specified as null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="collectionName" /> 被指定为空。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the schema to return.
trans-unit.target: 指定要返回的架构的名称。

trans-unit.source: A set of restriction values for the requested schema.
trans-unit.target: 请求的架构的一组限制值。

trans-unit.source: Returns schema information for the data source of this <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> using the specified string for the schema name and the specified string array for the restriction values.
trans-unit.target: 使用表示架构名称的指定字符串以及表示限制值的指定字符串数组返回此 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection" /> 的数据源的架构信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" /> that contains schema information.
trans-unit.target: 包含架构信息的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />。

trans-unit.source: The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply n depth of values which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection.
trans-unit.target: `restrictionValues`参数可以提供的值所指定的特定集合的限制集合的 n 深度。

trans-unit.source: In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you need to set the preceding restrictions to null and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for.
trans-unit.target: 为了对给定的限制，设置值和设置的其他限制的值，你需要设置前面的限制条件为 null，然后为你想要为指定值的限制中的相应值。

trans-unit.source: An example of this is the "Tables" collection.
trans-unit.target: 此示例为"表"集合。

trans-unit.source: If the "Tables" collection has 3 restrictions: database, owner, and table name; and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl", then you would need to pass in the following values (at a minimum): null, "Carl".
trans-unit.target: 如果"Tables"集合具有 3 限制： 数据库、 所有者和表名称;你想要取回仅与"Carl"的所有者关联的表，然后你将需要以通过 （至少） 的以下值： null，"Carl"。

trans-unit.source: If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction.
trans-unit.target: 如果未传入限制值，默认值用于该限制。

trans-unit.source: This is the same mapping as passing in null, which is different than passing in an empty string for the parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 这将是相同的映射与传入 null，这是不同于传入的参数值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，空字符串 ("") 被视为可为指定的参数的值。

trans-unit.source: Queries using <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.GetSchema%2A> are case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 查询使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.GetSchema%2A>区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Because of Oracle's treatment of cases when a schema is first created, this can lead to unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 由于 Oracle 的处理的事例时首次创建架构，这可能导致意外的结果。

trans-unit.source: If the schema was created without quotes`,` Oracle stores the object name in upper case.
trans-unit.target: 如果架构创建不带引号`,`Oracle 以大写形式存储的对象名称。

trans-unit.source: If the schema was created with quotes, Oracle stores the object name in the casing provided.
trans-unit.target: 如果创建包含引号的架构，Oracle 提供的大小写方面存储的对象名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that you create a table called MyTable, using one of the following two statements:
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你创建一个名为 MyTable，使用以下两个语句之一表：

trans-unit.source: To retrieve information about this table via the **GetSchema** method in the first case, you would have to pass "MYTABLE" in as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索有关通过此表的信息**GetSchema**方法中第一种情况，你将必须作为自变量中传递"MYTABLE"。

trans-unit.source: In the second case, you would have to pass "MyTable" in as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 在第二种情况，你必须在作为参数传递"MyTable"。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="collectionName" /> is specified as null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="collectionName" /> 被指定为空。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when Oracle sends a warning or an informational message.
trans-unit.target: 当 Oracle 发送警告或信息性消息时发生。

trans-unit.source: Because the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle uses the Oracle Call Interface (OCI), whenever the data provider receives a Success With Info message, an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.InfoMessage> event is generated.
trans-unit.target: 适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序使用 Oracle 调用接口 (OCI)，每当数据提供程序收到成功与信息消息，因为<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.InfoMessage>生成事件。

trans-unit.source: An example would be creating a stored procedure that contains a syntax error.
trans-unit.target: 示例将创建包含语法错误的存储的过程。

trans-unit.source: The call to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A> method would succeed.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>方法将成功。

trans-unit.source: However an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.InfoMessage> event would be generated informing you of the syntax error.
trans-unit.target: 但是<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.InfoMessage>将通知你语法错误生成事件。

trans-unit.source: Clients who want to process warnings or informational messages sent by the server should create an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleInfoMessageEventHandler> delegate to listen to this event.
trans-unit.target: 想要处理警告或信息性消息由服务器发送客户端应创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleInfoMessageEventHandler>委托来侦听此事件。

trans-unit.source: Opens a connection to a database with the property settings specified by the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ConnectionString" /> 指定的属性设置打开一个到数据库的连接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> draws an open connection from the connection pool if one is available.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>从连接池中绘制的开放连接，如果有的话。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it establishes a new connection to the database.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它在建立新连接到数据库。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> goes out of scope, the connection it represents does not close automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>超出范围，它表示的连接不会关闭自动。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，必须显式关闭连接通过调用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The connection is not open.
trans-unit.target: 连接未打开。

trans-unit.source: Cannot change the database.
trans-unit.target: 不能更改数据库。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string containing the version of the server to which the client is connected.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含客户端所连接到的服务器的版本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The version of the connected server.
trans-unit.target: 连接的服务器的版本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ServerVersion%2A> property is in Oracle version format.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.ServerVersion%2A>属性是在 Oracle 版本格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, the format for an Oracle8 release is a string in the form "8.1.7.0.0 Oracle8 Release 8.1.7.0.0 - Production."
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于 Oracle8 版本的格式是窗体中的字符串"8.1.7.0.0 Oracle8 释放 8.1.7.0.0-生产。"

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> and displays some of its read-only properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>并显示部分只读属性。

trans-unit.source: The connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 连接已关闭。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 获取连接的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Data.ConnectionState" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.ConnectionState" /> 值的按位组合。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Closed" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="Closed" />。

trans-unit.source: The allowed state changes are:
trans-unit.target: 允许的状态更改是：

trans-unit.source: From `Closed` to `Open`, using the `Open` method of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 从`Closed`到`Open`，使用`Open`方法<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>对象。

trans-unit.source: From `Open` to `Closed`, using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A> method of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 从`Open`到`Closed`，使用<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.Close%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of a derived class, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>, sets its <xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.ConnectionString%2A>, and displays its <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.State%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建派生类的实例<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection>，设置其<xref:System.Data.IDbConnection.ConnectionString%2A>，并显示其<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection.State%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 创建作为当前实例副本的新对象。

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance..
trans-unit.target: 作为此实例副本的新对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.ICloneable> 接口时使用。
